services.name: Services
services.description: I don't follow a checklist when working through a problem, firmly believing every opportunity requires it's own unique approach.

services.name: 01. User experience design
services.description: Using the double diamond design methodology, I make sure that I'm solving the right problem - and solving that problem right.

services.name: 02. Web Development
services.description: I develop websites with the future in mind.  For me, that means simple solutions backed with proven technology.  For you, that equates to reliability and maintainability.

featuredWorkDescription: I enjoy creating delightful human experiences in both the digital and physical environments.  Below are some of my most recent, most exciting works.
